participant_1.background:
I dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.
I play the guitar while I wear comfortable clothes and write my stories.
unfortunately , my family lives across the country from me.
i am in a very intimate and loving relationship.
i need a wheel chair to get around.

participant_2.background:
I like to wear comfortable clothes that allow me to move around and express myself.
i am currently going to school to be an artist.
My family members all have different jobs, but we all share a love for animals.
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing alright. How about you?
I'm doing well. I just dropped the dogs off at the kennel before heading to my parents' house.
Oh, I love dogs! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a pug. They're both really sweet.
That sounds adorable! I'm sure they're going to have a lot of fun at the kennel.
I hope so! I know they're going to miss me.
What are you doing at your parents' house?
I'm going to spend some time with them and write a few stories. I'm a writer, and I love to write while I'm wearing comfortable clothes.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day. I love writing too! What kind of stories do you write?
I write a lot of short stories and poems. I'm also working on a novel, but it's a slow process.
That's awesome! I'm sure your work is great. I'm working on an art project right now.
That sounds cool! What kind of art are you doing?
I'm painting a portrait of my dog. I'm not very good, but I'm enjoying the process.
That sounds like a fun project! I'm sure it will turn out great.
